mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order(buy_date, status, uid, aid, total_price) VALUES (#{buyDate}, #{status}, #{user.id}, #{address.id}, #{totalPrice})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_order SET total_price = #{totalPrice} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE t_order SET pay_date = #{payDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE t_order SET deliver_date = #{deliverDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE t_order SET confirm_date = #{confirmDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE t_order SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS oid, o.buy_date as buyDate, o.pay_date as payDate, o.deliver_date as deliverDate, o.confirm_date as confirmDate, o.status as ostatus,o.total_price AS totalPrice, u.id AS uid, u.username, u.password, u.nickname, u.role, a.id AS aid, a.recipient, a.address_info AS addressInfo, a.phone, a.zip, cp.id AS cpid, cp.price AS cpPrice, cp.num AS purchaseNum, p.id as pid, p.name, p.price AS pPrice, p.img, p.stock, p.status AS pstatus, p.sales FROM t_order AS o LEFT JOIN t_cart_product AS cp ON o.id = cp.oid LEFT JOIN t_user AS u on o.uid = u.id LEFT JOIN t_address AS a on o.aid = a.id LEFT JOIN t_product as p on cp.pid = p.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
SELECT status FROM t_order WHERE id = #{id}
